screen0.subtitle: Online workspace designed by and for sport coaches worldwide.

screen1.subtitle: Simplify the daily life of every coach

sections.p1: For decades, sport is constantly evolving and the development of new technologies has only accelerated this phenomenon. The possibilities offered by them has increased tenfold the importance given to sports.
sections.p2: The Mannschaft is fully committed in the data revolution from 2004 by promoting scientific methods as much as sport ones'. Since then, more and more teams follow their example and dissect the performance of their players with physical and technical data.
sections.p3: The Qaobee project was born of this and is the result of a stated ambition: to create a powerful, complete and intuitive workspace which is the personal playground of all coaches for the daily management and support in the improvment of performance.
sections.p4: The link between observation, intuition and scientific analysis.

sections.p1: Qaobee is the ideal space to develop your passion for sport.
sections.p2: Find all the data about your players, your staff and your club. Gather your observations, analyze the progress of your effective and measure changes in your performance. Your Qaobee workspace accompanies you in a logic of reasoned choices.
sections.p3: Qaobee is also a passionate coaching community where you can share and collaborate.

slide1.subtitle: Lead serenely
slide1.p1: Qaobee is a unique workspace to drive your activity, plan your season and have an overall view of the performance of your team.
slide1.p2: All sports informations (medical or administrative) of your effective are met in one place. Your data are secure, valued and available indefinitely in your workspace.
slide1.p3: Save time and lead more effectively.

slide2.subtitle: Collect sports information in real time
slide2.p1: We were inspired by your needs to create Q.Swarm, a mobile application that allows you to capture all the data from your observations, consistently in real-time.
slide2.p2: Q.Swarm allows you to centralize into your workspace easily all the elements that seem relevant for you to analyze.

slide3.subtitle: Analyze your data
slide3.p1: It is crucial for a coach to receive accurate and complete information about his activity.
slide3.p2: With Q.Analytics, access to advanced statistics allowing you to quickly analyze and identify areas for improvement.

slide4.subtitle: Optimize your performance
slide4.p1: The coach is perpetually in search of individual and collective performance.
slide4.p2: Q.Lab help you interpret and decide differently. Its predictive analytics engine allows you to imagine future scenarios and hustle your habits. Compare your performances with the analyzes developed by Q.Lab and maximize your results.

slide5.subtitle: Collaborate with passionate community
slide5.p1: Q.Link connects and allows coaches to collaborate across borders.
slide5.p2: Join and benefit from a collaborative workspace where you can build, share and capitalize.

screen5.maintitle: With you, no matter the situation !

contact.title: Contact us
contact.title2: Do not hesitate to contact us
